#include <iostream>
using namespace std;
bool isDevil(int n)
{
    int r;
    while(n)
    {
        r = n%10;
        if ((r!=1)&&(r!=3)){return false;}
        n/=10;
    }
    return true;
}

int main()
{
    int T,n; cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        cin>>n;
        for (int i=n;i>=0;i--)
        {
            if (isDevil(i)){cout<<i<<"\n";
            break;
            }
        }
    }
    return 0;
}
